title: Busan Sajik Baseball Stadium
text:
The Busan Sajik Baseball Stadium is a baseball stadium in Sajik-dong, Dongnae-gu, Busan, South Korea. It was built in 1985 and is the home stadium of KBO club Lotte Giants. It has a seating capacity of 26,800 as of the 2016 season. It is known as a mecca for Korean baseball.


== References ==
